animeTitle: Pokemon Movie 11: Giratina to Sora no Hanataba Shaymin
otherNames: Pokemon Diamond & Pearl: Giratina to Sora no Hanataba Sheimi, Pokemon: Giratina and the Sky Warrior, ポケットモンスター ダイヤモンド&パール ギラティナと氷空の花束 シェイミ
synopsis: After winding up in the middle of the battle between Giratina and Dialga, Shaymin somehow reached the place where Satoshi (Ash) and his friends are taking a break...But with the battle going on in the Torn World, also known as the Reverse World, they somehow got involved, leading to a more complicated case than they ever imagined...
